titleStmt.title: Ferdinand E. DeCoursey to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG12101

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: 1st - 20th Regiments Kentucky Infantry Primary Source Documents

body.p:
Head Quarters 13th U. S. Infantry.
Newport Barracks Ky.
May 26th 1864.
Sir:
I have the honor to enclose herewith consolidated Tri Monthly Report of men enlisted into the 13th Infy (Regular Army) from the State of Kentucky, from the 11th to the 20th of May 1864.

I. am Sir,
Very Respectfully.
Your Obdt. Servant,
Ferd E. de Coursey
1st Lieut &. Adjt 13th Infty
Actg Supt. Regtl Rectg Service

To his Excellency
The Governor of the State of Kentucky
Frankfort Ky.

13th
Newport Barracks
Newport Ky
May 20. 1864
13th
DeCoursey Ferd E.
Encloses Tri-monthly Report of Men enlisted into Regular Army from State of Ky, from 11th to 20th of May.

L. B. No 4. 1864 P. 61
Recd A. G. O May 30 1864
